newsitem.title: USA: Neurocrine says its drug to be developed.
newsitem.headline: Neurocrine says its drug to be developed.

text.p: Neurocrine Biosciences Inc said Monday that a drug based on its technology will be developed by a Johnson and Johnson unit. Under the agreement, Neurocrine will receive a milestone payment of $1 million.

The selection was made as part of a research and development collaboration formed in 1995. Under it, Janssen Pharmaceutics N.V., the Johnson & Johnson subsidiary, selected a lead drug candidate for development to treat anxiety and depression.
The candidate is based on Neurocrine's technology platform corticotropin releasing factor.
Neurocrine will also get a milestone payment of $1 million.
